entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: Mr. Malfoy is described as someone who prides themselves on being pure bloods and considers anyone of Muggle descent second-class. He is also mentioned as not daring to say anything under the gaze of the Minister of Magic.

entities.name: weasley
entities.description: Mr. Weasley is described as someone who is nodded at by Mr. Malfoy with a sneering look.

entities.name: draco
entities.description: Draco is described as shooting Harry, Ron, and Hermione one contemptuous look before settling himself between his mother and father.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as being shot a contemptuous look by Draco.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is described as muttering 'Slimy gits' after seeing the look from Draco.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as being shot a contemptuous look by Draco.

entities.name: ludo bagman
entities.description: Ludo Bagman is described as charging into the box and speaking over the roar of sound filling the packed stadium.

entities.name: fudge
entities.description: Fudge is mentioned as saying 'Ready when you are, Ludo' in a comfortable tone.

entities.name: minister of magic
entities.description: The Minister of Magic is described as someone who Mr. Malfoy does not dare to say anything under the gaze of.
